tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_countries; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_countries AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.country_name, COALESCE(v.country_id, -999999999) AS country_id, v.percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ra.amp_activity_id, loc.country_name, loc.country_id, sum(ra.location_percentage) AS percentage , COUNT(*) - COUNT(ra.location_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_location ra JOIN ni_all_locations_with_levels loc on loc.amp_location_id = ra.amp_location_id GROUP BY ra.amp_activity_id, loc.country_id, loc.country_name ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
